short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide generated files (e.g. "vendor") on Gerrit based on regular expression.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make code reviews faster and easier by hiding generated files (for example, "vendor" files in Go) that don't require human review. Gerrit Helper lets you define a custom filepath regex to toggle hiding files on any Gerrit changelist code review page.
